article_text: The pace of change that is impacting the United States of America is accelerating at an alarming rate. This week the Supreme Court bolstered Obamacare by rewriting the law and sanctioning the subsidies that are the centerpiece of the program. Today, by a 5-4 margin, the justices legalized gay marriage in all 50 states. This sweeping decision renders meaningless the vote of Americans in states across the nation.

article_summary:
The pace of change that is impacting the United States of America is accelerating at an alarming rate.
This week the Supreme Court bolstered Obamacare by rewriting the law and sanctioning the subsidies that are the centerpiece of the program.
Today, by a 5-4 margin, the justices legalized gay marriage in all 50 states.
This sweeping decision renders meaningless the vote of Americans in states across the nation.
